data.name: Raise Your Tribe
data.detailed_description:
“The world is a goddamned evil place, Don't be prey be hunter"


Survive in wilderness after end of the world. Explore post-apocalyptic island where artificial intelligence has taken over. Hunt animals and fight against dangerous robots. At night be aware of monsters created by radiation. Don't forget eat and drink! Weather can be capricious sometimes be sure to dress warmly and protect yourself from radiation and diseases.

"Your work will be rewarded"


The island offers several unique resources that you don't find anywhere else. Gather wood, stones, metal, berries, etc... Sneak in the buildings and in abandoned areas to find crafting materials. At night, you get the advantage of not being able to see you by other survivors but listen to your surroundings because you can’t know what kind of horror awaits behind the wall or tree.

"Your own house is your best protection"


Build your own shelter and upgrade it. You choose your house design but be sure to lock your doors! Do you prefer comfy wooden cabin on the beach or a properly protected military grade shelter with turrets and electrics? There is no right answer.

"Man becomes an animal when it is forced to survive."


Build your own tribe and start plundering the houses and goods of other tribes. Or be a lone wolf. It's up to you but never trust anyone in this world. Craft and find weapons and make sure you have enough bullets and rockets! This game offers a tactical shooter experience that measures your skill.
data.about_the_game:
“The world is a goddamned evil place, Don't be prey be hunter"


Survive in wilderness after end of the world. Explore post-apocalyptic island where artificial intelligence has taken over. Hunt animals and fight against dangerous robots. At night, you get the advantage of not being able to see you by other survivors but listen to your surroundings because you can’t know what kind of horror awaits behind the wall or tree.

Build your own tribe and start plundering the houses and goods of other tribes. Or be a lone wolf. It's up to you but never trust anyone in this world. Craft and find weapons and make sure you have enough bullets and rockets! This game offers a tactical shooter experience that measures your skill.
data.short_description: RAISE YOU TRIBE and fight against Robots or other Survivors. Explore, Craft, Build and Survive in a deadly post-nuclear war island where artificial intelligence has defeated humanity. Start from scratch and end up as the leader of Island!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 ／ Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti with 4GB VRAM
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: We are going to optimize for older computers!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 ／ Intel Core i7 8700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700 ／ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
